attributes.review: I got this app to support our “president” and was a little confused when it took 6 months to download!!! Frustrated I opened the app and suddenly both my guinea pigs dropped dead!!! 😱 As I was navigating the app my brother started choking and died😫!! Right after my mother’s head EXPLODED 🤯!! Baffled I looked back at my phone and all 7 of my cats just pass away💀!!!! Very upset and bewildered I deleted the app. DONT DELETE THIS APP IF U VALUE YOUR FAMILY!!!!!
attributes.title: KILLED MY FAMILY

attributes.review: I’m gonna give this 5 stars bc I’m not an emotional person bc an app is going to be taken away for security purposes
attributes.title: When all the TikTok people r crying

attributes.review: Tried to download this so many times, but it never worked. Then finally it downloaded in the middle of the night when I was sleeping and it started casting strange spells on me! Now I think I’m cursed! Would NOT recommend this app!
attributes.title: This rating is for you

attributes.review:
r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️ but I☺️cant🙄get through😍the door✨because my🏡booties🎂too😚big🙈 was the first of many different sounds coming out off my phone when I opened this trump app. I was not only very frightened but also embarrassed because I opened this app at 1 in the morning realizing that my AirPods have disconnected the second I opened the app waking my entire family from their DEEP sleep. I was horrified that not only did I wake my family but also my whole neighborhood. As I lay in bed wondering how the heck I just caused this my neighbors started to call the police(aka🐷). Not only did this app bring unnecessary attention to my house but also the 🐷s. Now I was really in deep s*** so to make a long story short 
dooooooooo noooooooottttt dooooowwwwwnnnnnlllllooooaaaaddd ttthhhhhhiiiissss family waking 🐷summoning app.✨🧚🏼
attributes.title: Read this please😋

attributes.review: As a fellow American🇺🇸 who is in full support of our great president😌, bunker boy👶, this app makes is horrible🤢This app hacked my phone😱 and cannibalized my entire family😰 worst app ever😡

So I downloaded this app and it asked me to pay $80 for every single button I pushed, not to mention it played 5 adds every 2 seconds. I could barely do anything! I wanted to take care of my talking Angela but it would let me with all the money and the ads I had to play. This app made straight TikTok and trump supporters fly around on my fyp like what- anyways my pockets are DRAINED this app is a scam don’t waste your time on it. 

Side note:
(It has illegal content and it’s disgusting how this app is still up.)
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DONT GET THIS
